```{r }

library(tidyverse)
library(gganimate) # Her loades en pakke til at kunne lave visualiseringer
library(gapminder) #Her loades en pakke, som er et dataset over lande og sundhed.
library(gifski) # Her loades en pakke, så vi kan vise visualiseringer som bevæger sig, længere nede.

```
Okay, now that we have the tools we need from the library, we will download the data we would like to visualize

```{r}
Abortions_per_capita_link <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Digital-Methods-HASS/au557916_Thomsen_Emil/main/Abor_Per_capita.csv"


abor_per_capita <- read_csv(url(Abortions_per_capita_link)) #Reading the CSV files with the links above.
```
